trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Kingston
There were no other sightings in Kingston on or around November 30th 2002
Summary: Moved fast like a meteor but abruptly changes direction.
divs: Sighting DetailsA friend and I were outside on an empty street and were just talking to each other. I wanted to look for a meteor so I looked up. I thought I saw one except it behaved strangely. It headed south for a few seconds before turning abruptly to face almost northeast, a huge change in direction. It continued traveling northeast before disappearing. It was hard to see since it was moving so fast but it looked like a meteor or little star. In fact, I would of assumed it was a meteor if it weren't for the HUGE direction change. I dismissed what I saw at first and tried to think of how a meteor could change direction so quickly before realizing it could be a UFO. My friend didn't notice or care, and dismissed it entirely. I never suggested to him, though, that it was a UFO.
